arts.ttl: Leverkusen fall to dramatic defeat in Madrid, Stuttgart keep qualification hopes alive
arts.sum: Falling to defeat late on against Atletico Madrid, Bayer Leverkusen dropped to 6th in the Champions League standings, whilst VfB Stuttgart kept their qualification hopes alive with a 3-1 away win against Slovan Bratislava.
Ahead of tonight's clash in Slovakia, the lineups have been released for Stuttgart's clash with Bratislava.

arts.ttl: 10 Champions League talking points as Liverpool eye history and Jurgen Klopp wants revenge
arts.sum: The Champions League returns on Tuesday after more than a month, with Liverpool currently leading the way and Manchester City at risk of missing out on the knockout stages

arts.ttl: Slovan Bratislava vs. Stuttgart preview: Team news and predicted lineups
arts.sum: Here is our preview of Tuesday's Champions League clash between Slovan Bratislava and VfB Stuttgart, including our predicted lineups.

arts.ttl: Slovan Bratislava vs. VfB Stuttgart: UEFA Champions League probable teams, match stats and LIVE blog!
arts.sum: With the wind currently in their winning sails, VfB Stuttgart are set for a crucial showdown in Slovakia as a team led by Deniz Undav and Enzo Millot seek a victory over Slovan Bratislava on Tuesday that would significantly aid their chances of staying in the competition (kick-off: 9pm CET). Slovan's race in European competition is run for this season, as Vladim√≠r Weiss's side are playing for pride as one of three teams in the Champions League still pointless and out of the running for the knockout stage.

Slovan Bratislava gear up for their first competitive match in over a month when they take on VfB Stuttgart on Tuesday. The Slovakian side have lost all six Champions League matches so far. VfB Stutt...
